remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓若要顯示，您必須新增至或。In order for a to be displayed, you must add it to a or . 若要建立子功能表，您可以加入物件加入至屬性之父代。To create submenus, you can add objects to the property of the parent . 類別提供的內容，讓您設定的外觀和功能的功能表項目。The class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item. 若要顯示功能表項目旁的核取記號，請使用屬性。To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the property. 您可以使用這項功能，來識別在互斥的功能表項目清單中選取的功能表項目。You can use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items. 例如，如果您有一組功能表項目來設定中的文字色彩的控制項，您可以使用屬性來識別目前選取的色彩。For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a control, you can use the property to identify which color is currently selected. 屬性可以用來定義要選取功能表項目是可以按下鍵盤組合。The property can be used to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item. 如多重文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式中顯示的物件，您可以使用方法，將合併的 MDI 功能表的父代與它的子表單，以建立合併的功能表結構。For objects displayed in a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) application, you can use the method to merge the menus of an MDI parent for with that of its child forms to create a consolidated menu structure. 因為無法重複使用多個位置中同時，例如在和，您可以使用方法來建立一份用於另一個位置。Because a cannot be reused in multiple locations at the same time, such as in a and a , you can use the method to create a copy of a for use in another location. 事件可讓您執行工作，才能在顯示的功能表。The event enables you to perform tasks before a menu is displayed. 例如，您可以建立此事件，以顯示或隱藏功能表項目，根據您的程式碼狀態的事件處理常式。For example, you can create an event handler for this event to display or hide menu items based on the state of your code. 事件可讓您執行工作，例如當使用者將滑鼠指標放在功能表項目時，應用程式的功能表項目提供詳細的說明。The event enables you to perform tasks such as providing detailed help for your application's menu items when the user places the mouse pointer over a menu item. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的功能表結構。The following code example creates a menu structure for a form. 範例程式碼加入，表示最上層功能表項目中，選取字型的大小，將子功能表項目加入至它，然後將兩個子功能表項目加入至該功能表項目代表應用程式中的大型和小型的字型選項。The example code adds a to represent the top-level menu item, adds a submenu item to it for selecting a font size, and then adds two submenu items to that menu item that represent large and small font choices in an application. 這個範例需要有名為物件`mainMenu1`和第四個物件命名`menuItem1`， `menuItem2`， `menuItem3`，和`menuItem4`。The example requires that there is a object named `mainMenu1` and four objects named `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定的標題與功能表項目的`text`參數，您也可以指定存取金鑰放入來作為存取金鑰字元之前 '&' 字元。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' character before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要指定 「 檔案 」 中的"F"做為存取金鑰，您會指定做為功能表項目的標題"& 檔案 」。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 您可以使用這項功能可提供功能表的鍵盤巡覽。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 設定`text`參數 」`-`"會導致您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準功能表項目。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立在建構階段指定功能表項目的標題。The following code example creates a that specifies the caption of the menu item at the time it is constructed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定的標題與功能表項目的`text`參數，您也可以指定存取金鑰前放置一個 '&' 字元來作為存取金鑰。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要指定 「 檔案 」 中的"F"做為存取金鑰，您會指定做為功能表項目的標題"& 檔案 」。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 您可以使用這項功能可提供功能表的鍵盤巡覽。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 設定`text`參數 」`-`"會導致您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準功能表項目。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. 此外，您可以使用這個建構函式來指定將處理委派功能表項目所建立的事件。In addition, you can use this constructor to specify a delegate that will handle the event for the menu item being created. 必須設定您將傳遞給這個建構函式呼叫事件處理常式可以處理事件。The that you pass to this constructor must be configured to call an event handler that can handle the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件與指定的標題和連線將處理之事件處理常式的委派功能表項目的事件。The following code example creates a object with a specified caption and an delegate connected to an event handler that will handle the event for the menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定的標題與功能表項目的`text`參數，您也可以指定存取金鑰前放置一個 '&' 字元來作為存取金鑰。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要指定 「 檔案 」 中的"F"做為存取金鑰，您會指定做為功能表項目的標題"& 檔案 」。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 您可以使用這項功能可提供功能表的鍵盤巡覽。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 設定`text`參數 」`-`"會導致您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準功能表項目。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. `items`參數可讓您指派來定義這個功能表項目的子功能表的功能表項目的陣列。The `items` parameter enables you to assign an array of menu items to define a submenu of this menu item. 陣列中的每個項目也可以指派給它的功能表項目的陣列。Each item in the array can also have an array of menu items assigned to it. 這可讓您建立完整的功能表結構，並將它們指派給功能表項目的建構函式。This enables you to create complete menu structures and assign them to the constructor for the menu item. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例中建立物件與指定的標題，事件處理常式會處理事件的方法，來連接每個功能表項目的子功能表項目的陣列。The following code example creates an object with a specified caption, an event handler connected to a method that will handle the event each menu item in an array of submenu items. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用提供狀態的應用程式功能表中的其他功能表項目與屬性組合。You can use the property in combination with other menu items in a menu to provide state for an application. 例如，您可以將核取記號置於功能表項目群組中的項目來識別要顯示的應用程式中的文字字型的大小。For example, you can place a check mark on a menu item in a group of items to identify the size of the font to be displayed for the text in an application. 您也可以使用屬性，以識別一組互斥的功能表項目中的選取的功能表項目。You can also use the property to identify the selected menu item in a group of mutually exclusive menu items. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不能設定為`true`最上層功能表項目。This property cannot be set to `true` for top-level menu items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性以提供應用程式中的狀態。The following code example uses the property to provide the state in an application. 在此範例中，一組功能表項目可用來指定文字的色彩控制項。In this example, a group of menu items are used to specify the color for the text in a control. 提供的事件處理常式由事件的三個功能表項目。The event handler provided is used by the event of three menu items. 每個功能表項目指定文字的色彩， `menuItemRed` （紅色）， `menuItemGreen` （綠色），或`menuItemBlue`（藍色）。Each menu item specifies a text color, `menuItemRed` (Red), `menuItemGreen` (Green), or `menuItemBlue` (Blue). 此事件處理常式決定哪一個功能表項目已按下、 放置一個核取記號來選取的功能表項目和變更表單的文字色彩控制項。The event handler determines which menu item was clicked, places a checkmark to the selected menu item, and changes the text color of the form's control. 這個範例需要已加入此程式碼置於表單的命名空間。The example requires that the namespace has been added to the form that this code is placed in. 這個範例也需要已新增至表單，此程式碼範例位於名為`textBox1`。The example also requires that a has been added to the form that this example code is located in that is named `textBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會發生事件時這使用者按下。The event occurs when this is clicked by the user. 此事件也會發生，如果使用者選取功能表項目，使用鍵盤，並按下 Enter 鍵。This event also occurs if the user selects the menu item using the keyboard and presses the Enter key. 它也會發生的存取金鑰或攠摝坫按下時相關聯。It can also occur if an access key or shortcut key is pressed that is associated with the . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性包含任何項目，就不會引發這個事件。If the property for the contains any items, this event is not raised. 父功能表項目不會引發這個事件。This event is not raised for parent menu items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件以執行工作時按下。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to perform tasks when a is clicked. 此範例會建立呼叫`mainMenu1`及加入兩個物件`topMenuItem`(`File`) 和`menuItem1`(`Open`)。The example creates a called `mainMenu1` and adds two objects, `topMenuItem` (`File`) and `menuItem1` (`Open`). 然後連接`Click`事件`menuItem1_Click`事件處理常式。It then connects the `Click` event to the `menuItem1_Click` event handler. 當使用者按一下`Open`功能表項目，初始化，且會顯示。When the user clicks the `Open` menu item, an is initialized and displayed. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`Form1`。The example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引數傳遞給事件處理常式提供物件，可讓您能夠執行繪圖以及其他圖形化介面上的作業的功能表項目。The argument passed to a event handler provides a object that enables you to perform drawing and other graphical operations on the surface of the menu item. 您可以使用此事件處理常式來建立自訂的功能表，以符合您的應用程式的需求。You can use this event handler to create custom menus that meet the needs of your application. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 這個範例會繪製功能表項目使用和，，然後繪製功能表項目周圍。This example draws a menu item using a and a , and then draws a around the menu item. 繪圖透過執行物件，傳遞至事件處理常式中參數。The drawing is performed through the object, which is passed to the event handler in the parameter. 這個範例需要您具有初始化屬性之項目的`true`。This example requires that you have initialized the property for the item to `true`. C# 範例中，加上下列程式碼中表單的建構函式， `InitializeComponent`、 事件連結：For the C# example, add the following code in the form's constructor, after `InitializeComponent`, to hook up the event: `this.menuItem1.DrawItem += new DrawItemEventHandler(menuItem1_DrawItem);` [!code-cpp[OwnerDraw example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/OwnerDraw example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[OwnerDraw example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/OwnerDraw example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OwnerDraw example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/OwnerDraw example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供功能表項目的父功能表的功能表項目集合中的索引的位置。This property provides the indexed position of a menu item in the menu item collection of its parent menu. 您可以使用這個屬性重新定位到其功能表中的不同位置的功能表項目。You can use this property to reposition a menu item to a different location within its menu. 您也可以使用這個屬性，建立時在建立時指定其功能表結構中的位置。You can also use this property when creating a to specify its position in a menu structure at the time of creation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會切換功能表中的兩個功能表項目位置。The following code example switches the position of two menu items in a menu. 下列程式碼範例需要有兩個物件會建立具名`menuItem1`和`menuItem2`。The following code example requires that two objects are created named `menuItem1` and `menuItem2`. `menuItem1`功能表項目下移一個位置，在功能表中，而`menuItem2`將向上移動一個位置。The `menuItem1` menu item moves down one position in the menu, while `menuItem2` moves up one position. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個功能表來啟動功能表項目，透過程式碼，而不傳送任何事件資訊。You can use this menu to activate a menu item through code without passing any event information. 例如，如果您想要啟用功能表項目為基礎，就會發生在您的應用程式，您可以呼叫的動作針對該方法。For example, if you want to activate a menu item based on an action that occurs in your application, you can call the method for that . ## Examples 在此範例中以程式設計方式按一下功能表項目使用`PerformClick`方法。In this example you programmatically click a menu item by using the `PerformClick` method. 首先，您建立主功能表 (`mainMenu1`) 並將它加入兩個功能表項目， `menuItem1` (`File`) 和`menuItem2`(`Edit`)。First, you create a main menu (`mainMenu1`) and add to it two menu items, `menuItem1` (`File`) and `menuItem2` (`Edit`). 您也使用按一下功能表項目時，將資料傳送至事件處理常式的事件。You also use the event to send data to the event handler when a menu item is clicked. 然後您使用`PerformClick`方法來按一下`File`功能表項目。Then you use the `PerformClick` method to click the `File` menu item. 當您啟動應用程式，`File`功能表項目已啟用，而且訊息方塊包含文字 「 在按下功能表檔案。 」When you start the application, the `File` menu item is activated, and a message box that contains the text "The File menu is clicked." 會出現在螢幕上。appears on the screen. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`Form1`。The example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件只會在功能表項目具有子功能表項目可以顯示時發生。This event only occurs when a menu item has submenu items to display. 您可以使用此事件處理常式來新增、 移除、 啟用、 停用，請選取，或取消選取 根據您的應用程式的狀態，才能讓它們顯示的功能表項目。You can use this event handler to add, remove, enable, disable, check, or uncheck menu items based on the state of your application before they are displayed. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以判斷是否中顯示的功能表會顯示前，會啟用物件，提供支援進行剪下、 複製和刪除作業。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether objects that provide support for cut, copy, and delete operations are enabled before the menu they are displayed in is shown. 此範例會判斷如果`textBox1`、控制表單上、 已啟用，擁有輸入焦點，而且有啟用之前選取的文字物件。The example determines if `textBox1`, a control on the form, is enabled, has input focus, and has text selected before enabling the objects. 這個範例需要該三物件會建立具名`menuCut`， `menuCopy`，和`menuDelete`已建立。This example requires that three objects are created named `menuCut`, `menuCopy`, and `menuDelete` have been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 核取記號不一定表示一組功能表項目互斥狀態。Check marks do not necessarily imply a mutually exclusive state for a group of menu items. 您可以使用這個屬性，可對使用者指出核取記號的功能表項目是互為獨佔模式。You can use this property to indicate to the user that the check mark of a menu item is mutually exclusive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來變更應用程式的狀態。The following code example uses the property to change the state of an application. 在範例中，一組功能表項目會假設用來指定文字的色彩控制項。In the example, a group of menu items are provided that are used to specify the color for the text in an control. 在範例中，提供此事件處理常式由三個功能表項目的事件。In the example, the event handler provided is used by the event of the three menu items. 每個功能表項目指定色彩， `menuItemRed`， `menuItemGreen`，或`menuItemBlue`。Each menu item specifies a color, `menuItemRed`, `menuItemGreen`, or `menuItemBlue`. 此事件處理常式決定哪一個功能表項目已按下、 放置一個核取記號來選取的功能表項目和變更表單的文字色彩控制項，名為`textBox1`。The event handler determines which menu item was clicked, places a checkmark to the selected menu item, and changes the text color of the form's control, named `textBox1`. 此範例也會使用屬性來示範如何使用選項按鈕核取來顯示互斥的功能表項目。The example also uses the property to demonstrate how a radio-button check is used to show menu items that are mutually exclusive. 這個範例需要已加入至表單，其中包含這個程式碼的命名空間。This example requires that the namespace has been added to the form that contains this code. [!code-cpp[Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定功能表項目的標題時，您也可以指定存取金鑰放 '&' 來存取金鑰作為字元之前。When you specify a caption for your menu item, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要指定 「 檔案 」 中的"F"做為存取金鑰，您會指定做為功能表項目的標題"& 檔案 」。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 您可以使用這項功能可提供功能表的鍵盤巡覽。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 此屬性設定為"`-`"會導致您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準功能表項目。Setting this property to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立功能表項目、 設定標題、 指派攠摝坫、 讓功能表項目成為可見，且會顯示快顯功能表項目的顯示索引鍵。The following code example creates a menu item, sets the caption, assigns a shortcut key, makes the menu item visible, and shows the shortcut key display for the menu item. 這個範例需要也就是已建立名為`menuItem1`。The example requires that a has been created that is named `menuItem1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來修改而不需要合併功能表或停用功能表的功能表結構。You can use this property to modify a menu structure without having to merge menus or disable menus. 比方說，如果您想要隱藏完整的一段功能從您的應用程式的功能表，您可以隱藏它們從使用者將此屬性設定為`false`。For example, if you want to hide a complete section of functionality from the menus for your application, you can hide them from the user by setting this property to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立功能表項目、 設定標題、 指派攠摝坫、 讓功能表項目成為可見，且會顯示快顯功能表項目的顯示索引鍵。The following code example creates a menu item, sets the caption, assigns a shortcut key, makes the menu item visible, and shows the shortcut key display for the menu item. 這個範例需要也就是已建立名為`menuItem1`。The example requires that a has been created that is named `menuItem1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MenuItem.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.Text Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MenuItem.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.Text Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MenuItem.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.Text Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
